Project Summary

Project Information

Field Value
Name HBase
Description Apache HBase™ is the Hadoop database. Use it when you need random, realtime read/write access to your Big Data. This project's goal is the hosting of very large tables -- billions of rows X millions of columns -- atop clusters of commodity hardware.
Homepage http://hbase.apache.org

Project Organization

Field Value
Name The Apache Software Foundation
URL http://www.apache.org/
